name: floating manufactory
description:
an incremental game where you have to make the most you can in ten minutes. You are limited by space, and have to balance everything you place. Except crates, those can and should fall.

Instructions and credits are in the game

This is my submission for Godot Wild Jam #15. I think I have improved a lot since my last game, but I still lack polish. It was pretty fun making it though, so that's a definite plus.
